title: Limits increases in real property taxes due to a revaluation, reassessment or update to five percent
summary: Limits increases in real property taxes due to a revaluation, reassessment or update to five percent of the real property tax liability for such property prior to such revaluation, reassessment or update.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to limiting the increase in real property taxes resulting from a reassessment
